long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hoop Tab is an exciting basketball game extension that challenges you to shoot the ball and score as many baskets as possible in between tabs while you browse. Hoop Tab is designed to be both fun and engaging, with easy-to-use controls that make it accessible to players of all skill levels.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Hoop Tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be provided by Microsoft Bing

Hoop Tab is a fun and addictive basketball game that is sure to provide you entertainment as you open new tabs while you browse.
